name: High Stakes Sledding
description:
Master your (rocket) sledding skills as you hurl yourself at harder and harder to reach targets!

HEY, YOU!

ARE YOU PAYING ATTENTION? I'M ONLY GONNA SAY THIS ONCE, DUDE.

USE THE WASD/ARROW KEYS TO SLIDE YOUR SLED AROUND, AND USE SPACEBAR TO KICK ON THE JETS. WHY ARE YOU LOOKING AT ME LIKE THAT? IT'S PERFECTLY SAFE.

OH, AND PRESS E TO JUST HOP RIGHT OFF THE THING! THAT WOULD BE HILARIOUS!

IF YOU GET STUCK PRESS R AND I'LL SET YOU BACK UP ON THE RAMP.

IF YOU'VE GOT THE SKILL, STICK AROUND FOR 6 SICK LEVELS.  DON'T EMBARRASS ME WITH YOUR SCORE, EITHER, GOT IT?

AWESOME SOUND EFFECT FOR THE SLED SKID COMES FROM HERE

EQUALLY AWESOME SOUND EFFECT FOR BOOSTERS CAME FROM HERE

AMAZING ACTION FONT COMES FROM HERE

INSANELY WICKED BACKGROUND MUSIC FROM HERE
